summary: Gets rid of the ugly elven forehead ridges.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE - This mod has been merged with [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=30]No More Blocky Faces[/url] by Xenius. You can still download this version if you want, but Xenius\'s version looks much, much nicer. :)

I altered the normal maps for the elven races to reduce the ugly forehead ridges. May not be to everyone\'s taste, but those ridges were really bugging me. Just a simple re-texture.

BONUS! - The dirt-simple PSD files I used. Uploaded as a separate file to save bandwidth.

BONUS AGAIN! - By popular demand, I\'ve added a Breton Edition, which removes the forehead wrinkles from both male and female Bretons.

---- Instructions ----
Extract to your /data/ folder.

---- Conflicts ----
This will conflict with any other mod that alters the normal maps for the elven races.

---- Permission/Credit ----
Do whatever you want with this file; it was a simple five minute photoshop job. You can upload it wherever you like or modify it however you want, and you don\'t need to ask permission.

As always, thank you Bethesda for giving us a game we can so easily mod!
author: Arlekin

files.name: Artorias Gear for Irritated Koala v1_2
